front.title: Content-Locked Encryption and Authentication of Nameless Objects

abstract.t: This document specifies CCNx CLEAN - content-locked encryption and authentication of nameless objects - as a way of enabling encrypted and naturally de-duplicated content in CCN. CLEAN allows producers to encrypt large collections of static data and use the FLIC Manifest to convey the necessary decryption information to consumers. As a result, CLEAN encrypts nameless content objects without any application input.
